projects.name: CloneCloud
projects.summary: CloneCloud is a pixel perfect clone of the audio distribution and music sharing platform SoundCloud. This was inspired by love for and background in music.
highlights: Provided full CRUD functionality for songs and playlists, while storing media on AWS S3 to reduce load times
Built a custom media player that grants users control of their song listening experience through clickable and synchronized HTML5 media play and Wavesurfer.js
Created extensive custom Rails routes geared towards providing users optimal exposure to new content
Implemented likes, follows and comments using joins tables and polymorphic associations, providing users withgreater insight into similar media and the tastes of other users

projects.name: Dynamite Hero
projects.summary: Dynamite Hero is based off of guitar hero where you hit notes aligned with a song as they come at you. This time, you are playing to Napolean Dynamite's sweet moves!
highlights: Devised custom collision detection logic to trigger different conditions based on a variety of gameplay objects, ensuring unique behaviors for each type of note
Developed a disco ball using circle motion that alters the UI by speeding up and slowing down as a player develops a streak to provide visual cues for success
Aligned and visualized notes and with a song by iterating them and using a setTimeout, adjusted the difficulty level by only setting every second or third note

projects.name: Dinder
projects.summary: A group decision making app that answers: where should we get dinner tonight? We'll find a restaurant option that you and your friends can all agree on, so you can circumvent the annoying 3 hour round-and-round of indecision.
highlights: Group project based on MERN stack, spearheaded backend development and pushed changes using Git workflow
Harnessed Node Mailer via backend routes in MongoDB to send specialized access codes that enable users to join a session and submit food preferences for dinner
Utilized Yelp’s API and allow for custom options based on location and cuisine, providing users ability to select from the best restaurants in with the qualifications they are looking for

work.summary: First commercial hire responsible for generating the sales pipeline and managing the cardiovascular telemedicine needs for best-in-class health systems
highlights: Developed and maintained relationships with healthcare technology officers and kept a 17% outreach to demo ratio
Executed on average 26 demos of Eko’s medical devices, machine learning, telemedicine platforms per month
Initiated a meeting with a top 5 health system that became an investor in the companies series B funding
Collaborated with 6 remote patient monitoring and virtual care institutions for SDK partnerships

work.summary: Directed all on-air content and the internship programming at USC's on campus radio station
highlights: Doubled the amount of radio shows from 50 to 106 by improving community presence through 15 events
Spearheaded and promoted a KXSC fundraiser which raised over $5,000 in revenue by cold calling alumni and selling 20 on air advertisement spaces
Restructured 12 staff positions to improve workflow and create direct and attainable employee goals
Redesigned the intern training system to adjust for a 200% increase in applications

references.name: Adam Rose
references.reference: Center for Risk and Economic Analysis of Terrorism Events
